qas.question: According to QS World University Rankings where does Cairo University rank?
According to QS World University Rankings, where does American University in Cairo rank?
According to QS World University Rankings and Al-Azhar University, Alexandria University and Ain Shams University are all ranked where?
What is the aim of new research institutes?

context: Cairo University is ranked as 401-500 according to the Academic Ranking of World Universities (Shanghai Ranking) and <a0_0>551-600<a0_0/> according to QS World University Rankings. American University in Cairo is ranked as <a1_0>360<a1_0/> according to QS World University Rankings and Al-Azhar University, Alexandria University and Ain Shams University fall in the <a2_0>701+ range<a2_0/>. Egypt is currently opening new research institutes for the aim of <a3_0>modernising research<a3_0/> in the nation, the most recent example of which is Zewail City of Science and Technology.
